message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value is truly worth more.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I appreciate the middle ground you've offered, but I am still looking to keep my expenses lower. Could we possibly agree on $12,500 for the product?
